title: Ugh this is getting ridiculous.
body:
1 hour queue every game, only to get 4 players who feed their lanes and force you to pull off some near god like shit to save the nexus at 200 health.

You still lose because despite being able to 1v5 you still have 4 feeders on your team who get blown up within 2 seconds of looking at the 16/3 teemo monstrosity.

The other game didnt fair much better.

pls rito nerf queue boss, lossen up the matchmaking a tad because there are people playing but they are all just out of each others mmr brackets.

replies.body:
After all this arguing id like to point out that you all completely missed the point of this post anyway.

I was actually bitching about the 1 hour queue times, the shit teams were just salt rubbed in the wound.

And rereading your first comment yaia, "since you havent even bothered looking into my suggestion of joining a premade 5 team) 

Oh you thick fuck.... go through my post history find the thread i made DEDICATED TO THAT.

Oh and grats you made it out of bronze 5.

I PLACED bronze 1, and maintained that position for quite a while.

Im only b5 this season because of the soft reset and tilt.

> I PLACED bronze 1, and maintained that position for quite a while.
Im only b5 this season because of the soft reset and tilt.

Let's just forget that the MMR system even exists.

I ended b2, lets just forget that mmr is what got reset, not your lp.

lets also ignore that while youve all been bitching about me assuming im b5 for lyfe, i just did my b4 promos three fucking times today and lost each one because of feeders.

But i consistently climb back into said promos *gasp* maybe i dont belong here *ele giggle* sometimes the mmr system fucks up :D

now crawl back into your little hidey hole and come back with constructive criticism, because if you have a point im able to rebuttle, well it was never valid in the first place then.

If you don't want to be stuck in bronze, start counter picking; your last 20 games have been all {{champion:85}}.
Majority of your victories is because you got carried.
You sit here blaming soft reset and tilt but you don't find a solution to your problems. 
If you're not willing to change you'll never climb.
You only play Kennen AD in top & mid.
Your builds are all the same.
Start getting a bigger champion pool and counter pick your enemy lanes.

I have like 20 champs in my champ pool, im only playing nothing but kennen because the skin is coming out and i wanted to learn him, owned the champ for like 2 days.

But hey, do like everyone else does and only scratch the fucking surface and think you know all the details from smelling the scent of the stain that was left behind by the dust let off from the scratching of the tip of the iceberg of details.

Or for a GoT reference "You know nothing Jon Trash"

And my PROBLEM only one, is feeding teammates.

as i have mentioned on many MANY MAAAAAAAAANY occasions, i actually play really fucking good when i dont have to spend 90% of the game yelling at my team, oh and before you say "well just ignore your team then" cheah no... see if i dont yell at them, they play even worse which means i lose even more.

So uh yeah unless you have a solution to that issue directly. dont wanna hear it.

Wards? i ward higher than the average for a bronze player.

map awarenes? i have an eye on my minimap at all times.

cs? again above average for bronze.

teamfights? well when i actually have team to participate in also pretty damn good.

Objective pressence? outstanding, because i focus on towers more than kills.

So really yes there are skills i can get BETTER in, but there isnt really any fundamental skill i am lacking in that is keeping me in bronze.

Which leaves two factors.

Tilt.

And my team.

Now as we all know tilt does very many things, one of which is clouds your judgement, as an example when im tilted, because im not fucking thinking when im tilted, i will happily flash ult the enemy team 1v5 while grinding my teeth thinking about that 1/5 adc and how fed his lane is, and that as youd expect causes even more tilt.

So really theres one solution here and thats to stop tilting.

But thats a catch 22 because to stop tilting my teammates have to stop playing like trash.

And they wont not play like trash when they see me tilting, its a never ending cycle of tilt.

Hence why i am proprieter of mandatory ranked lockouts if you feed for a certain number of games in a row.

Will i be affected by this? fuck yes, if i get one particularly retarded %%%% of a human being i will feed for 4-6 games in a row easily while it try to fucking calm down from wanting to piledrive the %%%% through his keyboard.

Will it clean up ranked because there wont be as many salty mother fuckers? yes.

Why arent we doing it? "hur durr thatd be unfur for the bad players" good, it should be, they should be in bots, or norms, fucking practicing.

If they want to play ranked you have to go in with a "i am here to win mentality" if you cant fucking win a lane by yourself, without spamming chat for help, you dont belong in ranked, because that forces the jg to camp your lane, which makes the other 2 lanes suffer from lack of counter ganks, then any enemy jg with half a brain cell will notice this and camp those 2 lanes and win the game that way.

And unfortunately as fucking stupid as bronze players are they still have half a brain cell, so they can do that.

Also your definition of carry is way askewed by smurfs and shit.

What i call a carry is literally the most fed person on the team, regardless of kda.

0/15/30 thresh winning all your teamfights for you? hes the fucking carry.

2/10/5 tryndamere just destroyed literally all the enemies turrets, including all the t1's? sorry 10/5 graves, but trynds the carry.

Anyone that provides some form of meaningful contribution to the team that goes above and beyond getting kills, which is easy as fuck in bronze, is the real carry.

If you want to judge a players worth based on how many kills they got, go play csgo, go play cod, go play anything that has a win condition based on kills.

But dont play league, league doesnt have a ticker, there isnt some secret win condition where if you get 500 kills you win the game instantly.

Kills only serve the purpose of gold income, and later on getting them on the death timer for mad pushes. literally the only reason they exist.

league is so much about the pushing that you could make players invincible and buff minions, itd still be playable.

Youd just lose 90% of the fucking anime wannabee %%%gots that all want to be gosu or faker.

Which ironically would make bronze more bearable.
So what was the point of this post?
Vent anger.
Good job, Boards hates you.
Lol I'm not gonna look up your history in fear of getting AIDS, but tell me you're not learning a champ in ranked. That's fucking stupid, even for you

Yes i am learning a champ in ranked want to know why? im at the bottom of the mmr bracket, i have nothing to lose.

So why not put myself into a high pressure scenario where i know for a fact my team is going to suck balls while learning a champ.

Shock treatment, infact every champ i play i learnt that way, even the ones im legitimately good with.
Do a normal with me tonight around 8pm. If you are good we can duo ranked.
sure why not im always down.

Ok, sweety, you make the same qq comments every single day. 

Since you haven't even bothered looking into my suggestion of joining a premade 5 team (which would solve all of your issues btw), imma give it to you straight. 

**You are in bronze V**._ It is a toxic wasteland down there. Sometimes because of trolls, but usually because people have no clue what they are doing._ 
You keep talking about feeders, but i look at your match history and I see some pretty below average scores on you (2/14, 1/7, 1/17...). Your average KDA for the last 20 games is 1.4
 Your CS is usually pretty good for a bronze V player, but it is something you can always work on to improve. Out of your last 20 games, you purchased 1 pink ward. 1. You gotta work on that vision dude, even if its just you, its gonna make the game so much easier. 

If you deserve to climb, you will. Regardless of the trolls. I made it out of bronze V in less than a week and you can too, if you look to learn from your mistakes and weaknesses instead of coming to the boards to complain. 

P.s: If you are really serious about climbing out of bronze V you should stop playing kennen adc.
you're wrong, didn't you read that he can 1v5? (2/14, 1/7, 1/17...) are decent scores, it's obvious the other 4 teammates are the one who're feeding.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

9/8/8
5/2/4 with 10 cs per minute
9/11/3

And those are only good games that i lost.

Not even counting the other what 10 games i carried?

That and if shitstain up there had eyes they would notice i dont play kennen adc

I play kennen ad in the top and mid lane.

And lastly to round it all off, cause and effect is a thing.

If im 1/0 farming up in mid, bot lane happens to feed 5 kills then their lane decides to come mid and i now get repeatedly tower dived by a fed 3v1, is it my fault for looking at my lane, or is it bots fault for feeding theirs.

i blame bot because if they hadnt fed id atleast be able to fight back and close the gold gap.

The little things ya know?

But yes lets use straight up kda scores that dont factor in literally ANY variables other than  "but did you die" like a bunch of bronzies.

Actually lets go deeper and look at the three games you mentioned.

1/7/2 kennen game? i remember that one vividly actually lux got first blood so i backed off played safe then died for a second time 10 minutes into the game when the 4/1 yi ran in and flash q ultied me to death. then roll the death montage as i constantly get picked out in team fights because they realised "this %%%% cant farm because we camped his ass and he got ZERO help"

2/14/11 game? i remember that too because i was duoing with that fiora and had a very particular skype call where the both of us questioned why the fuck we even entered the premade ( we joined a team of five for that game) and questioned the caits intellect ( i was support that game btw), it gets even more complicated when you go and check the caits match history which actually supports my argument as they feed in the vast majority of their games and only have a 33% win rate.

And lastly the 1/17/6 game? which from what i can tell was the zilean normal? look at my build... just stop and think for a second was i trying that game? with full ad zilean support? like seriously stop and let that marinate in your head till it sinks in.

The thing is, you say you don't play kennel adc, but you are building him adc in every single game you play. Top/mid/support. It doesn't matter. You always are building the same items and probably in the same order (I CBF looking at your build order). It stands out that your build order is so static, that you never build to cover your weaknesses. In some of the games you were in it would have been far better to build ap or prioritize some sort of defensive item. 

The thing that really ticks me off, as well as probably annoying your team, is the fact that you build the same build for kennen support. Where are your wards? Where is your protection for the ADC? You are gonna have a lot more success in the long run if you build ap or choose different champs. 

**Getting out of bronze V started packl:**

* Top: {{champion:85}} (because you play him a lot) , {{champion:54}} ,{{champion:36}}  
* Mid: {{champion:1}} , {{champion:99}} 
* Jg: {{champion:11}} , {{champion:19}} 
* ADC: {{champion:18}}, {{champion:222}} 
* Support: {{champion:89}} , {{champion:1}} 

**"9/8/8
5/2/4 with 10 cs per minute
9/11/3

And those are only good games that i lost.

Not even counting the other what 10 games i carried?"**

Well, to me, those scores aren't particularly stand out-ish as doing super well and carrying enough to be able to get out of the mmr bracket you are currently in. 

I checked those 20 games again, and I can only see 2 games with scores that you can boast about being a carry. The rest are pretty average, with just as many deaths as kills as assists. 

"If im 1/0 farming up in mid, bot lane happens to feed 5 kills then their lane decides to come mid and i now get repeatedly tower dived by a fed 3v1, is it my fault for looking at my lane, or is it bots fault for feeding theirs.

i blame bot because if they hadnt fed id atleast be able to fight back and close the gold gap."


Happens to everyone at one point or another, but did you know that I can see exactly when you died? In all of the games I checked out (about 5 of the better scored ones, including the ones **you** mentioned) _you are dying pretty consistently throughout_. I believe you that sometimes other lanes don't do so well and the enemy starts roaming to punish you, but this isn't the case in every game. If you ward more, maybe you'd die less to tower dives and roams ~just saying~

The entire premise of a tower dive defeats the purpose of warding.

They were in vision whey they came DOWN the lane and all just piled into the turret and cc'd me to death then walked back out.

Its not like they flashed over from wraith camp or something.

Complete vision while i tried to 1v3 defend turret because i had to do SOMETHING.

Also categorically i only ever get out-warded by the support with sight-stone, and even then sometimes i still ward more than them, so we can throw me not warding out the window.

And lastly, you say "pretty average scores" yes that will happen when you have to fight large groups of people by yourself because your team takes 5 minutes to decide what they want to buy (im 2v1ing botlane 90% of the time because of that when i play adc) or they have no concept of what an objective is "oh kennen just solo pushed a nexus turret all by himself? that is clearly the signal for me to go push the t1 bot turret instead of coming to help him end the game, my decision will drag the game out for 20 more minutes and almost lose a few times but thats fine" 

Not everything is as black and white as "but was your score good" league is a multifaceted game, if you want to get an accurate judge of skill based on kda theres only two places you can do that.

1v1's in customs.

And call of duty.
But you only ward more than 13% of the player base. You barely ward at all

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2r8bFiju,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-15T01:30:25.473+0000)
>
> The entire premise of a tower dive defeats the purpose of warding.
> 
> They were in vision whey they came DOWN the lane and all just piled into the turret and cc'd me to death then walked back out.
> 
> Its not like they flashed over from wraith camp or something.
> 
> Complete vision while i tried to 1v3 defend turret because i had to do SOMETHING.

If that was the case you had no business trying to defend the turret. If they can and will dive you back off. Because if you don't its most likely that they will take your life and the turrets rather than just the turrets.

So what you are saying is "if people attack your turret and they are fed, go afk in fountain because you cant fight them"

Because thats what im hearing.

Couldnt go any other lane, they are fed remember.

Context mate context, you cant just look at the outcome and ignore the variables that led to it.

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2r8bFiju,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-15T01:37:33.927+0000)
>
> So what you are saying is "if people attack your turret and they are fed, go afk in fountain because you cant fight them"
> 
> Because thats what im hearing.
> 
> Couldnt go any other lane, they are fed remember.
> 
> Context mate context, you cant just look at the outcome and ignore the variables that led to it.

Not that's not what i'm saying at all. 

I merely said if you know yourself that you cannot hold a turret you should not be under it giving the already fed team more money. Simple logic really.

I dont think you get it. thats afking in that particular game.

cant go in jungle because my turret is the only one left standing, so i know for a fact its warded.

Cant farm my lane because well i cant leave turret.

cant go farm other lanes because i wont get any cs fighting with my team for it.

What do i do? nothing becuase outside of attempting to defend that turret there is nothing i can do.

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2r8bFiju,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-15T01:54:30.635+0000)
>
> I dont think you get it. thats afking in that particular game.
> 
> cant go in jungle because my turret is the only one left standing, so i know for a fact its warded.
> 
> Cant farm my lane because well i cant leave turret.
> 
> cant go farm other lanes because i wont get any cs fighting with my team for it.
> 
> What do i do? nothing becuase outside of attempting to defend that turret there is nothing i can do.

How is it afking?

Can't defend your turret - Okay fall back prepare to defend the next objective. Move to the other towers or lanes to clear minion waves **IF IT IS SAFE TO DO SO.**

you are the one who does not understand otherwise you would not be having this problem.

All I'm reading are excuses. Start thinking of solutions.

They just 100-0'd a turret by 3v1ing me

what makes you think it will work on the next turret.

i also addressed the other lanes part "i wouldnt get anything fighting with my own team for cs"

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2r8bFiju,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-15T02:20:42.188+0000)
>
> They just 100-0'd a turret by 3v1ing me
> 
> what makes you think it will work on the next turret.
> 
> i also addressed the other lanes part "i wouldnt get anything fighting with my own team for cs"

This is the last post I'm going to make on this topic irregardless of your response. 

The point I was making was that you shouldn't bother trying to defend a turret against 3 people by yourself; unless you are confident that you will be able to do so without being killed under the tower and them then proceeding to take the tower anyway. 

The point about backing off and preparing to defend your next objective means that your team will have more time to respond / respawn to help you defend so hopefully you don't have to try hold it alone.

Before you respond with "but mah team is bronze and won't group to help defend" I don't give a **s**hit about that situation. My point was for your consideration alone to improve your game play.

In a non bronze team? yes i would do that.

See what i did there instead of saying i cant do that but it doesnt matter because bronze, i said that i can do that but it doesnt matter because bronze.

When i reach a higher elo and my teams have a modicum of teamwork ill make plays based around it, but atm playing around the idea that my team will help me only gets me killed or loses games.

The one problem gold+ players have is they seem to have forgotten bronze elo is basically an entirely different game.

bronze literally is 1v9, you either carry your entire team, or pray to god that they dont feed.

Unfortunately i am not so far up the mmr chain that i can carry.

I am a dwarf among gnomes where i need to be a giant, to quote foxdrop.

Where this does show is that when my team is playing to an average level, so dont even need positive scores, they just need to be somewhat even with the enemy, i actually excel and get close to carry territory, because in those games i get to worry about my lane and my lane only.

I dont have to watch all three lanes at once and figure out if and when i should go save their sorry asses from that shit engage they just made, which means i have more time to think about my plays, which leads to less deaths and more kills, and more games won.

as an example the last game i played i had a 19/4 kogmaw winning all the teamfights for me so i said "ok i can go push then) sure my kda was crap at 5/8/5 but i single handedly pushed 2 inhib turrets, 4 inhibs (2 inhibs twice) 2 t1 turrets, 2 t2 turrets, a nexus turret, and eventually the actual nexus itself.

It was a combination of my pushing allowing kog to focus his efforts on winning fights.

And kogs teamfighting allowing me to focus my efforts on downing towers.

THAT was a good team, we worked together and trashed them.

Had either one of us not realised that and tried to do both at once? we probably wouldve still won thanks to kog but itd have been far more of a struggle.

^ to replicate that game i wouldnt even need a 19/4 kog, id just need someone with a positive score who can win the teamfights for my team weather thats me or someone else, which honestly in this game? not too much to ask actually, its impossible for all 9 players to be negative unless one person has all the kills, and thats very rare.

U think oce is bad?
U should've seen all the primary school students I had to deal with on the chinese server...
Gave up my ranked account and came to oce for peace of mind...
Trust me, oce is not that bad apart from level-up bots everywhere
Comparing this to my experience on NA id go play on NA in a heartbeat if the ping wasnt so bad.
